using System;
using EntityFramework;

namespace %namespace%
{
	/// <summary>
    /// Entity for table: %table_name%
    /// </summary>
    [Table("%table_name%")]
    public class %class_name% : %base_class%
    {
        public const string EntityTableName = "%table_name%";
		<%real_columns%>
		
		/// <summary>
        /// Column %column_name%
        /// </summary>
		public const string %column_name%Column = "%column_name%";
        [Field(%column_name%Column<%field_options%>[, ]%field_option%<%field_options%>)]
		public %column_type% %field_name%
		{
			get { return (%column_type%)GetValue(%column_name%Column); }
			set { SetValue(%column_name%Column, value); }
		}
		<%real_columns%>
    }
}
